{{{
public long queryTotal() {
    long total = 0;
    PersistenceManager pm = sp.getPersistenceManager();
    try {
      Query q = pm.newQuery("select stuffIdKey from " + ThingStuffJdo.class.getName());
      List<Key> ids = (List<Key>) q.execute();
      total = ids.size();
      q.closeAll();
    } catch (Exception e) { 
      e.printStackTrace();
      log.log(Level.SEVERE, "", e);
    } finally {
      pm.close();
    }
    return total;
  }
}}}
